messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4348
messages.msgSnippet: All the sudden, dh says crap and shakes his head laughing.  He says I have been arguing against getting an Easybake for 2 years and here the kids are
messages.messageBody:
"All the sudden, dh says "crap" and shakes his head laughing. He says
"I have been arguing against getting an Easybake for 2 years and here the
kids are learning."

Yea...life is getting so much better."

That's great! It's so much better to have a supportive partner...even tolerance is rather grating. Our unschooling lives have positively leaped forward on the joy scale since dh became fully supportive. Very cool.

Ren
